GSD.description:
wifi: mac80211: Fix UAF in ieee80211_scan_rx()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.8 by commit c0445feb80a4d0854898118fa01073701f8d356b. For more details please see the references link.
